bug.author: rushtehrani
bug.description:
When "Execute workflow" is clicked, the following error is thrown if the file is large (single video for example). Example video: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/onepanelio/core/files/5690503/sample_video.mp4.zip>sample_video.mp4.zip</denchmark-link>
